thread.title: Amit Shah Hails Somnath Temple Symbol of Sanatan Pride Amidst Welfare Prayers | Entertainment
thread.title_full: Amit Shah Hails Somnath Temple Symbol of Sanatan Pride Amidst Welfare Prayers | Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Amit Shah Hails Somnath Temple Symbol of Sanatan Pride Amidst Welfare Prayers | Entertainment
text: Amit Shah Hails Somnath Temple Symbol of Sanatan Pride Amidst Welfare Prayers Union Home Minister Amit Shah praised Lord Somnath as a symbol of eternal Sanatan culture during his visit to the jyotirlinga temple in Gujarat. Shah performed rituals and wished for prosperity. He also addressed public health issues following a fire at TRP Game Zone and cholera outbreak in Gandhinagar. [PTI](/pti-stories)| Ahmedabad | Updated: 01-06-2024 17:01 IST | Created: 01-06-2024 17:01 IST - Country: - India Union Home Minister Amit Shah on Saturday emphasized that Lord Somnath stands as a beacon of pride within the indelible Sanatan culture. Shah offered prayers for prosperity at the jyotirlinga temple in Gujarat, underscoring the enduring significance of Somnath. As a trustee of the Shree Somnath Trust, Shah performed 'dhwaj puja' and noted that long-standing rituals continue to inspire perseverance despite struggles. In a social media post, Shah expressed his wishes for India's welfare after his visit. Additionally, Shah reviewed actions at Rajkot International Airport related to last week's TRP Game Zone fire and instructed local officials on measures to control a cholera outbreak in Gandhinagar. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)
